des: "This is a great dressing just like the kind they serve in the Japanese steakhouses."
ins: In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, mustard, honey and pepper.  Once these are thoroughly combined, add the oil in a steady stream, whisking constantly.  When all of the oil is incorporated into the dressing, pour into a glass jar and chill until serving.
